name: Another Life - Life Simulator
description:
A simple and addictive life simulator where you can live a different life... Reach new heights and become much more!

SWIPE FOR LOVE
- Swipe right to find the love of your life.
- Have fun going on dates and who knows? You might even get married.

CAREERS
- Get that dream job, maximize your salary, get PROMOTED and become the CEO!

EXTRAORDINARY PATHS
- Complete achievements in the game to unlock cool and unique paths

LIVE YOUR SCHOOL LIFE
- Enjoy the leisurely pace of school life
- Study your favorite field to prepare for job opportunities

DRIVE YOUR DREAM CAR

BUY YOUR DREAM HOUSE

LIVE YOUR DREAM LIFE

And of course... much, much more coming soon to this life sim

If you have any suggestions, please don't hesitate to leave the feedback either in game, through email, or in the reviews.

Official Email Account:
anotherbyteinc@gmail.com

Official Twitter Account:
https://twitter.com/JustAnotherByte

Icons provided to this lifesim by:
https://icons8.com/

This life simulator game is a game, all events and occurrences are fictional. Any similarities with existing entities are purely coincidental. We've developed this fun game for teens and up so that people may play the game of life in a way that is fun and exciting! The simulater can act as a second life in that players can enjoy a simulation or even a microcosm of life. Since this game is freeplay and will forever be free to play, we've lowered the barrier to entry with this entry to games for teens section! Sink your teeth and stay around for a bit life simulator because it's a very immersive experience!
